title: Taliyah's W Bug
body:
I have a question about Taliyah and her knock up skill, her W. Did Riot changer her W in a way where we can't see where her W circle is?

I do not use quick cast, I like to use the normal features where I can see my skill shots before I use my skill shots. For example, before I use my Nami's bubble, her Q, I am given her range and also a small circle indicating an aim or skill shot.

Taliyah used to have the same circle for her W, but whenever I use Taliyah's W, all I see is the range of her W, but no circle. Is this a bug or perhaps Riot changed Taliyah's W? If it is not a bug, can you bring it back? I am a lv 7 tier Taliyah and I have not been performing well with her ever since this strange occurance.

replies.body:
This is also bothering me greatly, the ability seems to always cast in in the wrong direction, directly reverse of where i intended, and has no range indicator..
This has been since the change to casting mechanics several patches ago.

are you using quick cast? if you are, then you don't get a range indicator. unless yours is super bugged.

I still get my range indicator, I don't get the circle where her W will pop up
